        Signs a JSON dictionary with the ed25519 key for this account. The signature is done on canonical version of the JSON.
        Parameters:
        JSONDictionary - the JSON to be signed.
        Returns:
        the base64-encoded signature

      • createOutboundSession

        public java.lang.String createOutboundSession(java.lang.String theirIdentityKey,
                                              java.lang.String theirOneTimeKey)
        Generate a new outbound session. The new session will be stored in the MXStore.
        Parameters:
        theirIdentityKey - the remote user's Curve25519 identity key
        theirOneTimeKey - the remote user's one-time Curve25519 key
        Returns:
        the session id for the outbound session. @TODO OLMSession?

      • createInboundSession

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> createInboundSession(java.lang.String theirDeviceIdentityKey,
                                                                             int messageType,
                                                                             java.lang.String ciphertext)
        Generate a new inbound session, given an incoming message.
        Parameters:
        theirDeviceIdentityKey - the remote user's Curve25519 identity key.
        messageType - the message_type field from the received message (must be 0).
        ciphertext - base64-encoded body from the received message.
        Returns:
        {{payload: string, session_id: string}} decrypted payload, andsession id of new session.

      • getSessionIds

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSessionIds(java.lang.String theirDeviceIdentityKey)
        Get a list of known session IDs for the given device.
        Parameters:
        theirDeviceIdentityKey - the Curve25519 identity key for the remote device.
        Returns:
        a list of known session ids for the device.

      • getSessionId

        public java.lang.String getSessionId(java.lang.String theirDeviceIdentityKey)
        Get the right olm session id for encrypting messages to the given identity key.
        Parameters:
        theirDeviceIdentityKey - the Curve25519 identity key for the remote device.
        Returns:
        the session id, or nil if no established session.

      • encryptMessage

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> encryptMessage(java.lang.String theirDeviceIdentityKey,
                                                                       java.lang.String sessionId,
                                                                       java.lang.String payloadString)
        Encrypt an outgoing message using an existing session.
        Parameters:
        theirDeviceIdentityKey - the Curve25519 identity key for the remote device.
        sessionId - the id of the active session
        payloadString - the payload to be encrypted and sent
        Returns:
        the cipher text

      • decryptMessage

        public java.lang.String decryptMessage(java.lang.String ciphertext,
                                       int messageType,
                                       java.lang.String sessionId,
                                       java.lang.String theirDeviceIdentityKey)
        Decrypt an incoming message using an existing session.
        Parameters:
        ciphertext - the base64-encoded body from the received message.
        messageType - message_type field from the received message.
        theirDeviceIdentityKey - the Curve25519 identity key for the remote device.
        sessionId - the id of the active session.
        Returns:
        the decrypted payload.

      • matchesSession

        public boolean matchesSession(java.lang.String theirDeviceIdentityKey,
                              java.lang.String sessionId,
                              int messageType,
                              java.lang.String ciphertext)
        Determine if an incoming messages is a prekey message matching an existing session.
        Parameters:
        theirDeviceIdentityKey - the Curve25519 identity key for the remote device.
        sessionId - the id of the active session.
        messageType - message_type field from the received message.
        ciphertext - the base64-encoded body from the received message.
        Returns:
        YES if the received message is a prekey message which matchesthe given session.

      • encryptGroupMessage

        public java.lang.String encryptGroupMessage(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                            java.lang.String payloadString)
        Encrypt an outgoing message with an outbound group session.

      • addInboundGroupSession

        public boolean addInboundGroupSession(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                      java.lang.String sessionKey,
                                      java.lang.String roomId,
                                      java.lang.String senderKey,
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> forwardingCurve25519KeyChain,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> keysClaimed,
                                      boolean exportFormat)
        Add an inbound group session to the session store.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session identifier.
        sessionKey - base64-encoded secret key.
        roomId - the id of the room in which this session will be used.
        senderKey - the base64-encoded curve25519 key of the sender.
        forwardingCurve25519KeyChain - Devices involved in forwarding this session to us.
        keysClaimed - Other keys the sender claims.
        exportFormat - true if the megolm keys are in export format
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeds.

      • importInboundGroupSession

        public MXOlmInboundGroupSession2 importInboundGroupSession(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> exportedSessionMap)
        Import an inbound group session to the session store.
        Parameters:
        exportedSessionMap - the exported session map
        Returns:
        the imported session if the operation succeeds.

      • removeInboundGroupSession

        public void removeInboundGroupSession(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                      java.lang.String sessionKey)
        Remove an inbound group session
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session identifier.
        sessionKey - base64-encoded secret key.

      • decryptGroupMessage

        public MXDecryptionResult decryptGroupMessage(java.lang.String body,
                                              java.lang.String roomId,
                                              java.lang.String timeline,
                                              java.lang.String sessionId,
                                              java.lang.String senderKey)
                                       throws MXDecryptionException
        Decrypt a received message with an inbound group session.
        Parameters:
        body - the base64-encoded body of the encrypted message.
        roomId - theroom in which the message was received.
        timeline - the id of the timeline where the event is decrypted. It is used to prevent replay attack.
        sessionId - the session identifier.
        senderKey - the base64-encoded curve25519 key of the sender.
        Returns:
        the decrypting result. Nil if the sessionId is unknown.
        Throws:
        MXDecryptionException

      • resetReplayAttackCheckInTimeline

        public void resetReplayAttackCheckInTimeline(java.lang.String timeline)
        Reset replay attack data for the given timeline.
        Parameters:
        timeline - the id of the timeline.

      • verifySignature

        public void verifySignature(java.lang.String key,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> JSONDictinary,
                            java.lang.String signature)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Verify an ed25519 signature on a JSON object.
        Parameters:
        key - the ed25519 key.
        JSONDictinary - the JSON object which was signed.
        signature - the base64-encoded signature to be checked.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • sha256

        public java.lang.String sha256(java.lang.String message)
        Calculate the SHA-256 hash of the input and encodes it as base64.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to hash.
        Returns:
        the base64-encoded hash value.

      • getInboundGroupSession

        public MXOlmInboundGroupSession2 getInboundGroupSession(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                                        java.lang.String senderKey,
                                                        java.lang.String roomId)
        Extract an InboundGroupSession from the session store and do some check. mInboundGroupSessionWithIdError describes the failure reason.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the room where the sesion is used.
        sessionId - the session identifier.
        senderKey - the base64-encoded curve25519 key of the sender.
        Returns:
        the inbound group session.

      • hasInboundSessionKeys

        public boolean hasInboundSessionKeys(java.lang.String roomId,
                                     java.lang.String senderKey,
                                     java.lang.String sessionId)
        Determine if we have the keys for a given megolm session.
        Parameters:
        roomId - room in which the message was received
        senderKey - base64-encoded curve25519 key of the sender
        sessionId - session identifier
        Returns:
        true if the unbound session keys are known.
